En pratsam bard g√•r l√§ngs med s√§llskapet.
En konstig lukt kommer fr√•n buskarna.
The side of the road is lined with mausoleums to long dead mercantile familiesSome of them appear to have been broken into and doors hang free on rusted hinges.

The PCs come across the scene of a massacreA party of bullywugs lies slaughteredThe party hears crying and can find a young bullywug child"My parents, dead," she croaks"Killed by human soldiersHelp me get back to my tribe," she begs.
N√§r du n√§rmar dig stranden skyndar sig 100 sk√∂ldpaddor fr√•n stranden.

A roadside shrine to a local deity is the scene of a gruesome murderA woman's body, dressed in blood-stained white robes, lies in the middle of road as if dragged and dropped thereYou see bloody steps heading away from the corpse towards the woods.
En grupp jordbrukare reparerar ett staket.
Den l√∂viga busken till v√§nster om stigen b√∂rjar gl√∂da i en iriserande nyans.
You stumble upon a small shrine dedicated to a deity of travelersIn the middle of the shrine you see a statuette with cupped hands, on which you can drop a coin for good fortune.
Inv√•narna anklagar partiet f√∂r helger√•n och sk√§ndning av deras gamla gravplats.
En rad ankungar f√∂ljer sin mamma √∂ver en trafikerad v√§g.
A leather cord ties a well-groomed speckled horse to a nearby treeThe horse is fitted with an elegant but empty saddle.
You approach a caravan of camelsIt travels in same direction and the leader invites you to escort him as security.
V√§gen passerar genom en ruinerad, utbr√§nd stad som verkar √∂vergiven.

A powerful storm forced you to take the only available refuge - an elderly couple's home, whose every room held numerous open cups of pungent hybiscalyptus root essenceThe heated cups over the stove further suffused the air with itNow, some days down the road from them and several washings later, you can still smell the sharp aroma upon your gear and clothes.
You notice three small jars sitting in the middle of the roadOne is openYou also see a bloated body lying with its back towards youAs you approach, you hear loud buzzing from the bushes nearby.
A scraggly man sits at the crossroadsHe offers dreams at a bargain priceTo show he is being literal, he takes out a bottle containing a purple mist swirling inside
En begravningsprocession slingrar sig fram l√§ngs v√§gen och pr√§sterna ber alla de m√∂ter om donationer till tron.
En man i rock barri√§r v√§gen och kr√§ver en avgift, och skryter om sin stora makt som trollkarl.
The party falls in with a group traveling to a religious shrineEventually, the party becomes aware these are actually members of an opposing religion who plan to desecrate the shrine.
En naken spelman ber om skjuts till n√§rmaste v√§rdshus d√§r han l√§mnat sina kl√§der och pengar f√∂r att betala f√∂r dina besv√§r.
The PCs travel though an area suffering from a heat waveThe mid-day sun is exhausting and takes its toll on the characters.
En ryttarl√∂s h√§st galopperar f√∂rbi s√§llskapet, sadeln √§r m√§rkt av klor.
Pl√∂tsligt upph√∂r v√§dereffekterna och allt som √•terst√•r √§r ett tyst skymningsljus d√§r vindarna √§r helt lugna.
The carriage is overturned and all the passengers are deadOr are they undead?
Gruppen r√•kar ut f√∂r en enkel st√•lring som f√•r b√§raren att byta till den motsatta inriktningen.

The cemetery below the road is haunted by the tortured spirits of the murderedOn the full moon they rise up as skeletal aspirations and wraiths and terrorize travellers, pulling them into the catacombs below.
En liten grupp kn√§b√∂jande, verklighetstrogna statyer som √§r frusna av r√§dsla eller b√∂n.
The road leads through a tunnelHalfway through, the party finds a major wall and roof collapse revealing a large passage running adjacent to the road, with flickering lights visible further in.

A pack of five feral puppies eats a kobold corpse in a crossroads areaThey are less than a year old and they are a terrier breed meant for huntingThe leader of the pack is the best-fed and is not afraid to posture at the party if they get too close to the pack's latest meal.
The bridge is guarded by shady-looking characters who claim to be asistance.
A burly man sits next to a hay-wagon with a broken wheelHe waves in despair when he notices you.
Ett par gripar som f√∂rdrivs fr√•n sitt hem i bergen av en betraktare.

Alongside the road, a man calling himself The Amazing Steve asks the party if they want to see a performance of his trained petsThe slightest affirmative answer causes Steve to give a whistle, and a huge swarm of ravenous locusts suddenly manifests.
En man kommer ut p√• v√§gen, uppenbart skadad, f√∂ljt av ett antal kr√•kor.
Ett vagnt√•g som stannat p√• v√§gen blockerar trafiken medan f√∂rarna matar sina djur och fyller vattens√§ckar i en b√§ck.
Ovanligt gr√∂nskande och √∂vervuxen v√§gstr√§cka med banditer som √§r lindade i vinrankor och tigger om att sl√§ppas fria.
Partiell solf√∂rm√∂rkelse.
En m√§rklig skylt som √§r inristad i ett tr√§d n√§ra dig verkar nyskriven.
Tornet framf√∂r oss faller ner p√• bergssluttningen och √∂ver√∂ser v√§gen med enorma stenar.
En fet munk rusar f√∂rbi datorerna och mumlar: "Det √§r inte r√§ttvist."
V√§gen korsas av m√•nga djursp√•r, som om en flock djur korsade v√§gen samtidigt.
En ond trollkarl bunden till en p√•le, kroppen r√∂ker fortfarande.
En ambulerande f√∂rs√§ljare s√§ljer animerade leksaker.
Ett gr√•tande barn sitter ensamt mitt p√• v√§gen och h√∂rs innan man ser det.
En gl√∂dande dimma t√§cker v√§gen.
En ensam utl√§ndsk riddare rider f√∂rbi.
En jordb√§vning g√∂r att gruppen och en stor del av v√§gen faller ner i ett h√•l eller en klyfta.
En fr√§mmande hund eller ett annat djur f√∂ljer dig p√• avst√•nd.
V√§gen √§r genomsyrad av fickor med kvicksand.
N√§r en av gruppens medlemmar trampar i n√•got klibbigt b√∂rjar djuren f√∂lja karakt√§ren med nyfiket intresse.
Two groups of pilgrims from rival faiths block the road as they engage in aggressive debateEach side appeals to the heroes for help.
En stor folkmassa som flyr fr√•n n√•got kommer mot dig.
Tre unga m√§n arbetar med att v√§lta ett bebott utedass.
En delvis kollapsad bro har bara tv√• b√§rande balkar kvar.
En resande knivslipare erbjuder ett specialerbjudande till PCs f√∂r att f√∂rb√§ttra deras magiska vapen, men senare uppt√§cker PCs att magin i knivarna verkar vara borta.
A tall rock overlooks the roadAs the group passes, a filthy hermit babble prophecies and throws rotten food at them.
En grupp arga b√∂nder h√•ller p√• att lyncha n√•gon fr√•n ett tr√§d vid sidan av v√§gen.
A glint of light upon the road draws your scout's attentionA small holy symbol lies in the open, abandoned.

table.name: Item Properties
table.caption: Item Properties
rows: Attached
Attached to gauntlet or armor, leaving hand free.
Bonded
Weapon only usable by owner, cannot be removed from person without consent.
Breaking
Can be used to target and break objects at no disadvantage.
Concealable
Can be hidden from view.
Concussive
Creates a burst of sound or light on impact to deafen/blind/temporarily stun.
Deadly
Each upgrade increase attack die (up to d10).
Elemental: Air
Has properties related to air (e.gcan subtly manipulate winds, harness electricity).
Elemental: Earth
Has properties related to earth (e.gbenefits to mining).
Elemental: Fire
Has properties related to fire (e.gproduces heat/light, can cause burning).
Elemental: Metal
Has properties related to metal (e.gbenefits to blacksmithing).
Elemental: Water
Has properties related to water (e.gcan extinguish fires).
Elemental: Wood
Has properties related to wood/plants (e.gbenefits to gardening, nature traversal).
Flexible
Whip or whip-like; Range (close), AoE (close), Stunning (binding), Unwieldy (-2 AB).
Focused Area
AoE can be focused in a line, cone, etcEach upgrade allows a different option.
Focused Damage
AoE can be focused to only target specific creatures or objectsEach upgrade allows greater flexibility.
Impacting
Each upgrade increases range of knockback (close, short, medium, long).
Magical
Has general magical properties.
Masterwork
+1 attack or damage bonus. (Doubles Base Mundane value)
Penetrating
Ignore armorWith second upgrade, ignore shieldsAC otherwise still applies.
Poisonous
Can cause poisoning.
Ranged
Each upgrade increases range starting at short (short, medium, long).
Reach
Can be used at close range or thrown at no disadvantage.
Rending
Serration or other features cause sustained wounds and mutilation.
Siege
Can be used to break open structures.
Silenced
The weapon produces little to no sound on projection or impact.
Spellbreaking
Can silence spells/spellcasters on successful attack.
Stunning
Can be used non-lethally to incapacitate at no disadvantage.
Suppressing
Creates an obstacle to those in weapon range-2 AB to anyone in range.
Unique Appearance
May be a well known item or associated with a well-known person or faction.
